title: Jhin Bundle
body:
Why is the Jhin bundle more expensive then the kindred bundle when kindred was released? 
Kindred was 1462 rp with a 1350 skin marked down to 975 for release
Jhin is 1837 rp with a 1350 that isn't marked down also the total price is more expensive Jhin's full price is 2325 rp Kindred is 1950 rp so I'm confused why riot changed this

replies.body: I've been wondering this also. Illoai was also released with a 1350 skin that was bundled for 1462. It really sucks too because I had just enough leftover RP to buy him at what has been the new champ bundle price for a while. Really disappointing as I don't have enough RP to buy the bundle (I only use RP to buy stuff when it's on sale cause I can't afford otherwise) nor enough IP to buy him alone.{{item:3070}}
